metadata.name: INTRO
metadata.description:
An intro to the future

Choreography performed by Marta Glowk and Celzidor Andrei
Visuals by Celzidor Andrei
Music by Col Walder

This is the INTROduction of the world's first electro dance and interactive video mapping NFT series.

"Symbiosis of the choreography and the background"
The movement is blending in with geometrical forms, where lines and shapes are controlling movement and movement is controlling form.
Our vision of the future, the Era of Space and Technology. 


33% of the sale will be handed over to dance communities, dance-related events and/or dance teachers. Proofs will be provided.

Bonus content:
The winner of the auction will get "behind-the-scenes" footage as a gift and a high-resolution video file (4K UHD 3840x2160). Also, the buyer will receive pictures from the "Time Travel" dance video mapping show which was performed by Celzidor and Marta on several islands of Greece.
